show.subtitle: “It’s Our Money with Ellen Brown” provides a unique view behind the curtain of global finance and the monetary system by one of the top experts in the field.
show.title: It´s Our Money with Ellen Brown

title: A State-Owned Bank of Wisconsin?
content:
Despite recent years of corrosive state politics, Wisconsin voters may soon create a new way forward by electing a... <!--more--> public banking advocate as State Treasurer.
Madison attorney David Leeper has made creating a state-owned public bank his centerpiece with an urgent sense of purpose.
Ellen talks with him about his perspectives and later, on the Public Banking Report, with two prominent bankers and co-host Walt McRee about underlying bank dynamics that support the public bank option.
